title: The New Apple TV Remote Packs A Touch Surface, Microphone And Motion Sensors
text: Apple just unveiled the new Apple TV , and it will come with a brand-new remote featuring a slew of new sensors and buttons. The top half of the remote is a glass surface, allowing users to swipe through Apple TV’s interface, or use it to fast forward and rewind through video.
